caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. JERRY LEE
McCOLLOUGH, Defendant-Appellant. PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN,
Plaintiff-Appellee, v. BETH ANN McCOLLOUGH, Defendant-Appellant.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Court of Appeals Nos. 282449 and 282450.
opinion.opinion_text:
Actions on Applications for Leave to Appeal from the Court of Appeals.
